mean_cn: n. 咒骂语；  adj. 附加的
mean_en: a word or phrase (such as “Damn it!”) that people sometimes say when they are angry or in pain
sentence: People often accidentally blurt out expletives when they're in pain!
sentence_trans: 人们感到疼痛时，会不小心脱口说出咒骂的话！
word_etyma: ex出去 ＋ plet满，填满 ＋ ive形容词后缀 → 在外面等着填满 → expletive附加的
